sections.title: Getting Started
content: Welcome to our documentation! This guide will help you get started with our product.
Before you begin, make sure you have all the necessary prerequisites installed on your system.

subsections.title: Core Features
content: Our product offers a wide range of powerful features to enhance your workflow.
Explore the core functionalities that make our product stand out from the rest.

subsections.title: Advanced Features
content: Once you're comfortable with the basics, dive into our advanced features.
These tools will help you take your projects to the next level.

sections.title: Troubleshooting
content: Encountering issues? Our troubleshooting guide is here to help.
Find solutions to common problems and learn how to optimize your experience.
